string.value: Tsuri of Showa Town apparently is going to make a "fantastic gourmet dish". Interesting...
Tsuri said, in order to make the fantastic gourmet dish, he'll need #b100 #t04000157#s#k. I can't wait to see what comes out of this! #k#n#t04000157# #b#c04000157##k/100
Gourmet dish? This is nothing more than junk food! *sigh*
Hey there! Don't you want to try your hands on a fantastic gourmet dish?
That's right! No one can resist the sound of someone yelling "fantastic gourmet dish". Gather up the ingredients for me, and I'll give you half of what I make out of it.
Hey, how often do you think you get a chance to eat a fantastic gourmet dish like this? You might want to think again...
Oooh, that's some fine piece of meat there. With this, I can make the best hotdog you'll ever find.
Alright, here it is. Eat it before it turns cold.
I don't think you gathered up all the #b#t4000157#s#k like I asked you to get. Go get them before the sun goes down!
